comments.body:
* Specific to Excel Custom Functions.
 * Enables you to set key-value pairs, of a function's JSON id to the JavaScript function name.

(wordsmith) A handler for streaming functions.  The handler is passed automatically as the last parameter to a streaming function, and the function can then call `handler.setResult` to set the cell value, or hook into the `handler.onCanceled` event to be notified when it is no longer needed.
